00025 void DzLayerEditor::btnNewImage_clicked()
00026 {
00027     Q3FileDialog fd;
00028     if( fd.exec() == Accepted)
00029     {
00030         image = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage(fd.selectedFile());
00031         layerList->clear();
00032         layerList->insertItem( image->getLayer(0)->getFilename() );
00033         layerList->setCurrentItem( 0 );
00034 
00035         imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00036         update();
00037     }
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 void DzLayerEditor::btnNewLayer_clicked()
00042 {
00043     Q3FileDialog fd;
00044     if( fd.exec() == Accepted)
00045     {
00046         DzImageLayer *il = new DzImageLayer(fd.selectedFile());
00047         image->addLayer( il );
00048         layerList->insertItem( il->getFilename() );
00049         layerList->setCurrentItem( image->getLayerCount() - 1 );
00050         blendMode->setCurrentItem(0);
00051         blendMode_activated( 0 );
00052 
00053         imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00054         update();
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 void DzLayerEditor::blendMode_activated( int item )
00059 {
00060     DzImageLayer *il = image->getLayer( layerList->currentItem() );
00061     DzImageBlend *blend;
00062     sliderThreshold->setEnabled(false);
00063     switch(item)
00064     {
00065     case 0:
00066         blend = new DzAlphaBlend();
00067         break;
00068     case 1:
00069         {
00070             QImage pla, pwa;
00071             pla = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage( dzApp->applicationDirPath() + "/pants_length_alpha.tga" )->getPreview();
00072             pwa = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage( dzApp->applicationDirPath() + "/pants_waist_alpha.tga" )->getPreview();
00073             Dz2ndLifeBlendPants::LayerSet ls(
00074                 pla,
00075                 pwa,
00076                 .5f,
00077                 .5f);
00078             blend = new Dz2ndLifeBlendPants( ls );
00079             sliderThreshold->setEnabled(true);
00080             sliderThreshold->setValue(50);
00081         }
00082         break;
00083     case 2:
00084         {
00085             QImage sba, ssa, sca, scba;
00086             sba = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage( dzApp->applicationDirPath() + "/shirt_bottom_alpha.tga" )->getPreview();
00087             ssa = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage( dzApp->applicationDirPath() + "/shirt_sleeve_alpha.tga" )->getPreview();
00088             sca = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage( dzApp->applicationDirPath() + "/shirt_collar_alpha.tga" )->getPreview();
00089             scba = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage( dzApp->applicationDirPath() + "/shirt_collar_back_alpha.tga" )->getPreview();
00090             Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt::LayerSet ls(
00091                 sba,
00092                 ssa,
00093                 sca,
00094                 scba,
00095                 .5f,
00096                 .5f,
00097                 .5f,
00098                 .5f);
00099             blend = new Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt( ls );
00100             sliderThreshold->setEnabled(true);
00101             sliderThreshold->setValue(50);
00102         }
00103         break;
00104     case 3:
00105     default:
00106         {
00107             QImage sha;
00108             sha = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage( dzApp->applicationDirPath() + "/shoe_height_alpha.tga" )->getPreview();
00109             Dz2ndLifeBlendShoes::LayerSet ls(
00110                 sha,
00111                 .5f);
00112             blend = new Dz2ndLifeBlendShoes( ls );
00113             sliderThreshold->setEnabled(true);
00114             sliderThreshold->setValue(50);
00115         }
00116         break;
00117     }
00118     il->setBlendMode(blend);
00119 
00120     imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00121     update();
00122 }

00124 
00125 void DzLayerEditor::layerList_activated( int )
00126 {
00127     DzImageLayer *il = image->getLayer( layerList->currentItem() );
00128     DzImageBlend *blend = il->getBlendMode();
00129     sliderThreshold->setEnabled(false);
00130     if(blend->isA("DzAlphaBlend"))
00131     {
00132         blendMode->setCurrentItem(0);
00133         update();
00134     }
00135     else if(blend->isA("Dz2ndLifeBlendPants"))
00136     {
00137         sliderThreshold->setValue((int)(99.f * ((Dz2ndLifeBlendPants*)blend)->getLayerSet().pants_length_threshold));
00138         blendMode->setCurrentItem(1);
00139         update();
00140     }
00141     else if(blend->isA("Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt"))
00142     {
00143         sliderThreshold->setValue((int)(99.f * ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt*)blend)->getLayerSet().shirt_collar_threshold));
00144         sliderThreshold_2->setValue((int)(99.f * ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt*)blend)->getLayerSet().shirt_collar_back_threshold));
00145         blendMode->setCurrentItem(2);
00146         update();
00147     }
00148     else if(blend->isA("Dz2ndLifeBlendShoes"))
00149     {
00150         sliderThreshold->setValue((int)(99.f * ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShoes*)blend)->getLayerSet().shoes_height_threshold));
00151         sliderThreshold_2->setValue(0);
00152         blendMode->setCurrentItem(2);
00153         update();
00154     }
00155 }

00157 
00158 void DzLayerEditor::btnDeleteLayer_clicked()
00159 {
00160     if(image->getLayerCount() > 1)
00161     {
00162         DzImageLayer *il = image->getLayer( layerList->currentItem() );
00163         image->removeLayer(il);
00164         layerList->removeItem( layerList->currentItem() );
00165         imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00166         update();
00167     }
00168 }
00169 
00170 void DzLayerEditor::sliderThreshold_changed(int value)
00171 {
00172     if(!image) return;
00173 
00174     DzImageLayer *il = image->getLayer( layerList->currentItem() );
00175     DzImageBlend *blend = il->getBlendMode();
00176     if(blend->isA("Dz2ndLifeBlendPants"))
00177     {
00178         Dz2ndLifeBlendPants::LayerSet ls = ((Dz2ndLifeBlendPants*)blend)->getLayerSet();
00179         ls.pants_length_threshold = 0.01010101f * value;
00180         ((Dz2ndLifeBlendPants*)blend)->setLayerSet( ls );
00181 
00182         imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00183         update();
00184     }
00185     else if(blend->isA("Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt"))
00186     {
00187         Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt::LayerSet ls = ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt*)blend)->getLayerSet();
00188         ls.shirt_collar_threshold = 0.01010101f * value;
00189         ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt*)blend)->setLayerSet( ls );
00190 
00191         imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00192         update();
00193     }
00194     else if(blend->isA("Dz2ndLifeBlendShoes"))
00195     {
00196         Dz2ndLifeBlendShoes::LayerSet ls = ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShoes*)blend)->getLayerSet();
00197         ls.shoes_height_threshold = 0.01010101f * value;
00198         ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt*)blend)->setLayerSet( ls );
00199 
00200         imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00201         update();
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 void DzLayerEditor::sliderThreshold2_changed(int value)
00206 {
00207     if(!image) return;
00208 
00209     DzImageLayer *il = image->getLayer( layerList->currentItem() );
00210     DzImageBlend *blend = il->getBlendMode();
00211     if(blend->isA("Dz2ndLifeBlendPants"))
00212     {
00213         Dz2ndLifeBlendPants::LayerSet ls = ((Dz2ndLifeBlendPants*)blend)->getLayerSet();
00214         ls.pants_waist_threshold = 0.01010101f * value;
00215         ((Dz2ndLifeBlendPants*)blend)->setLayerSet( ls );
00216 
00217         imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00218         update();
00219     }
00220     else if(blend->isA("Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt"))
00221     {
00222         Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt::LayerSet ls = ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt*)blend)->getLayerSet();
00223         ls.shirt_collar_back_threshold = 0.01010101f * value;
00224         ((Dz2ndLifeBlendShirt*)blend)->setLayerSet( ls );
00225 
00226         imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00227         update();
00228     }
00229 }
00230 
00231 void DzLayerEditor::btnSaveImage_clicked()
00232 {
00233     Q3FileDialog fd;
00234     fd.setFilter("*.png");
00235     fd.setMode(Q3FileDialog::AnyFile);
00236     if( fd.exec() == Accepted)
00237     {
00238         QImage i = image->getPreview();
00239         QString filename = fd.selectedFile();
00240         i.setAlphaBuffer(true);
00241         if ( i.save( filename, "PNG", 100) )
00242         {
00243             image = dzApp->getImageMgr()->getImage(filename);
00244             layerList->clear();
00245             layerList->insertItem( filename );
00246             layerList->setCurrentItem( 0 );
00247             sliderThreshold->setEnabled(false);
00248 
00249             imagePreview->setPixmap( QPixmap( image->getPreview() ));
00250             update();
00251         }
00252     }
00253 }
